attributes.action: Cancel some exams for the class of 2021 as it’s not enough time to catch up
attributes.additional_details: we have lost 6 months of school 6 months of education, it is going to cause teenagers more mental issues than is needed, to catch up on 6 months of work is impossible and then be expected to sit the same exams that any other year would’ve done is ridiculous
attributes.background: i am a student sitting my exams in 2021 and i feel that sitting some of the exams are an unneeded pressure

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320772

Exam arrangements and the current coronavirus pandemic can cause worry and stress. You can find information on how to deal with stress here: 

Young Minds: https://youngminds.org.uk

Children’s Society: https://www.childrenssociety.org.uk/mental-health-advice-for-children-and-young-people/issues-affecting-young-people  

Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/info-advice/your-feelings/anxiety-stress-panic/coping-with-stress/
